text: The Ford Aerostar was the first minivan manufactured by Ford Motor Company. The vehicle was introduced in 1985 as a 1986 model. The Aerostar was discontinued after 1997 and replaced by the Windstar, which was sold alongside since 1995. although Aerostar's role went unfilled until the 2010 introduction of the Ford Transit Connect van. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Aerostar Category:Minivans
title: Ford Aerostar
